name: pyIAMvortex
description: An awesome python package that makes working with AWS IAM permissions easier.

name: Contributions to Moto
description: Made significant contributions to implement the mocks for AWS IAM Identity Center (SSO) APIs in the popular AWS mocking library (Moto).

name: My Personal Website
description: I built this personal website!  I am no frontend developer, but I had fun building this from scratch with Django, TailwindCSS, and AlpineJS. Also shoutout to the Catppuccin Color Scheme! The website is hosted on Google Cloud Run and has CI/CD setup for automatic deployments.

name: Kubernetes RBAC Manager Testing Example
description: A simple example repo on how you can write Helm integrations tests to test your Kubernetes RBAC configurations.
